verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [ARGM-ADV: reportedly] [V: told] [ARG2: French President Emmanuel Macron] [ARGM-TMP: last month] [ARG1: that he would maintain his trade policy with the aim of stopping Mercedes - Benz models from driving down Fifth Avenue in New York] .

President Trump reportedly told French President Emmanuel Macron last month that he [V: would] maintain his trade policy with the aim of stopping Mercedes - Benz models from driving down Fifth Avenue in New York .
